title: Elise spider form has no sound (After patch 6.4)
body:
Just played her in Oceania region.  She has no sound in her spider form when:

1. Auto-attacking
2. Using any ability
3. Transforming to human form

Not sure if this has already been reported, another player has also verified this.

replies.body:
Hey SweetSolitude7 -

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are investigating.

rito 
FIX IT cmon man this is rly badddddddd badddddd rito baddddddddddd
Yah, it is quite annoying right now. I also have the issue
Yeah I have the same issue. Why again my beloved Elise? <.<
Same thing for me.. fix the spider xD

replies.poster: O V 3 R L O R D
replies.body: yes. confirmed i just lost my promos because i could hear my abilities being casted. please fix rito
